metadata.title: Chinese Name Finder - Professional AI Chinese Name Generator
metadata.description: Cultural Companion provides professional, intelligent Chinese name generation service, combining traditional culture with modern AI technology.
metadata.keywords: Chinese name generator, AI naming, Chinese culture, Five Elements naming, poetic naming

user2.name: Michael Chen

user3.content: The cultural explanations provided with each name are incredibly detailed. Great for character naming in my novels.

freeTrial.title: Free Trial

expiry.question: Do credits expire?
expiry.answer: One-time purchase credits are valid as shown in the plan (30-90 days). Monthly subscription credits reset monthly.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, you can request a full refund.

upgrade.question: How do I upgrade my plan?
upgrade.answer: You can upgrade your plan anytime in account settings. Upgrades take effect immediately, unused credits are retained.

payment.question: What payment methods are supported?
payment.answer: We support credit cards, debit cards, Alipay, WeChat Pay, and other payment methods.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Inheriting Culture, Innovating the Future
about.description: Cultural Companion is an innovative company focused on AI Chinese naming. We combine the profound heritage of Chinese culture with cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology to provide users worldwide with Chinese name generation services rich in cultural connotations and personal characteristics.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Let everyone have a Chinese name rich in cultural connotations
mission.description1: In today's globalized world, more and more people hope to express their love and respect for Chinese culture through Chinese names. We believe that a good Chinese name is not just a combination of words, but also a inheritance of culture and emotional sustenance.
mission.description2: Through AI technology, we make the traditional art of naming more intelligent and personalized, allowing everyone to easily obtain Chinese names that match their characteristics and expectations.

cultural.title: Cultural Heritage
cultural.description: We deeply believe in the profound heritage of Chinese culture and are committed to passing on traditional cultural wisdom to the new generation

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: Using cutting-edge AI technology to give new life to the ancient art of naming in modern technology

userFirst.title: User First
userFirst.description: Centered on user needs, providing personalized and professional naming service experiences

global.title: Global Connection
global.description: Building cultural bridges, allowing people worldwide to feel the charm of Chinese culture

timeline.title: Development Journey
timeline.subtitle: Growth path from startup team to serving global users

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.heading: Protecting Your Privacy and Security
privacy.description: We understand the importance of privacy protection and are committed to handling your personal information in a transparent and responsible manner. This privacy policy details our data processing practices.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Cultural Companion ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI Chinese naming service.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, information we collect automatically when you use our service, and information from third-party sources with your consent.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, update, delete, or restrict the processing of your data.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Bank-level security measures to protect your data

transparency.title: Transparent Processing
transparency.description: Clear explanation of data collection and usage purposes

control.title: User Control
control.description: You can manage and control your data at any time

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing Details
dataProcessing.description: Specific data types we process and their purposes

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Service Providers
thirdParty.description: Our partner third-party service providers and their data processing scope

notices.children: Children's Privacy Protection: Our service is intended for users aged 18 and above. If you are under 18, please use our service under parental guidance.
notices.changes: Policy Change Notice: If our privacy policy undergoes significant changes, we will notify you 30 days in advance via email or website announcement.
notices.crossBorder: Cross-Border Data Transfer: Your data is primarily stored on servers within China. If cross-border transfer is required, we will take appropriate security measures.

contact.title: Have Privacy Questions? Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about our privacy policy or need to exercise your data rights, please feel free to contact our data protection team

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.heading: Terms of Service Agreement
terms.description: Please read these terms carefully. By using our service, you agree to abide by these terms. We are committed to providing quality service while protecting the legitimate rights of both parties.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Cultural Companion's AI Chinese naming service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: Cultural Companion provides AI-powered Chinese name generation services, combining traditional cultural wisdom with modern technology to create meaningful names.

eligibility.title: User Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use our service. If you are under 18, you must have parental consent to use our service.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree to use our service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You are prohibited from using the service in any way that could damage or impair the service.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Cultural Companion and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall Cultural Companion be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on this page.

service.title: Service Nature
service.description: AI-based naming suggestions for reference only

user.title: User Responsibility
user.description: Responsible for account security and compliance

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.description: Respect IP rights and use service content appropriately

terms.importantNotice: Important Notice: These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Cultural Companion. Please read all terms carefully before using the service. If you have questions, please contact our legal team.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.description: How to handle potential disputes and disagreements
dispute.jurisdiction: These terms are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. Any disputes shall be resolved through friendly negotiation first. If negotiation fails, the matter shall be submitted to the competent People's Court in Beijing.

company.title: Company Information
company.description: Legal entity information of the service provider

cta.title: Questions About Terms? We Can Help
cta.description: If you have any questions about the Terms of Service or need legal advice, our legal team is ready to provide professional answers

terms.finalNotice: Thank you for choosing Cultural Companion! We are committed to complying with all applicable laws and regulations to provide you with safe and reliable services. Your trust is our motivation for continuous improvement.

generate.title: AI Chinese Name Generator
generate.description: Create beautiful, meaningful Chinese names with our advanced AI technology

form.basicInfoDescription: Tell us some basic information to generate the most suitable name
form.englishNamePlaceholder: e.g., John, Sarah, or your original name
form.birthYearHint: For zodiac and Five Elements analysis

traditional.label: Traditional Classic
traditional.description: Derived from ancient texts and poetry

form.avoidWordsPlaceholder: e.g., certain characters or sounds you dislike
form.aiNote: AI will generate the most suitable names based on your preferences. Leave blank to use default settings.
